content.raw:
example of color blending in model editor:

![color_blend.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2162218717-color_blend.png)


if the input material script only has color components (e.g. `Gazebo/Grey`) and no textures, these colors will be overwritten by the ambient/diffuse/specular/emissive values in the widget
content.html:
example of color blending in model editor:

if the input material script only has color components (e.g. Gazebo/Grey) and no textures, these colors will be overwritten by the ambient/diffuse/specular/emissive values in the widget
